sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je neka oseba ali stvar
odd
, mislimo, da je čudna ali neobičajna.

seg.quote: There's something odd about its shape.
It was odd that she still lived at home.
The drug made him behave quite oddly.
Marsha found the play oddly disappointing.
Oddly enough, it was through him that I met Carson.

sense.def:
Odd
lahko uporabljamo pred samostalniki, kadar hočemo povedati, da je vrsta ali velikost nečesa naključna ali nepomembna;

seg.quote: You can add bones, the odd vegetable, and herbs.

sense.def:
Kadar sta dve stvari
odd
, ne pripadata istemu paru.

Števila, ki so
odd
, na primer 3, 17, in 129, niso deljiva z 2.

seg.quote: We first met twenty odd years ago.

sense.def:
Izraz
odds
pomeni verjetnost, da se bo nekaj zgodilo.

seg.quote: The odds are that they will succeed.
The odds are against children learning in this environment.

sense.def:
The odd one out
je oseba ali stvar v skupini, ki se razlikuje od drugih.

seg.quote: I was the odd one out; all my friends were in couples.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
at odds with someone
, se z njim ne strinja ali pa se z njim prepira.

seg.quote: She is at odds with her boss.
